name: Religion
descriptions: The Religion minor explores the world's religious traditions, ethical systems, and the role of religion in society and culture. Students take 18 hours with a balance of introductory and upper-level courses.
A minimum of 3 hours at the introductory level (10000) and a maximum of 6 hours at that level. At least 9 hours must be at the upper level (30000 or 40000).

electiveCourses.description: 15 additional hours, with at least 9 total hours at the 30000 or 40000 level.
